title: Nigerians Assessment of Economy and Living Conditi

content.question: Which of the following is a conclusion drawn from the data about personal living conditions in Nigeria?

choices.label: Nigerians’ perceptions of improvement in their personal living conditions were caused by the elimination of corruption among government officials.
Nigerians’ perceptions of improvement in their personal living conditions were caused by actual improvements due in part to the democratization process.
Nigerians’ perceptions of improvement in their personal living conditions were caused by the reinstatement of a military government that brought stability and order.
Nigerians’ perceptions of improvement in their personal living conditions were caused by the major reduction of income inequality among poorer citizens.

content.answer: Nigerians’ perceptions of improvement in their personal living conditions were caused by actual improvements due in part to the democratization process.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
